title: marundaLittaruLvAi
sahitya:
marundaLittaruLvAi enran madana rOgam ara-enakku oru tiru


anupallavi

  varundum anbar manamum vAzhvum madhurikka urup-peTravanE oru


caraNam 1    purandaranum mukundanum dishai mukhanum pOtri sheya puLLirukkum vELUr
 porundi vAzh mayilUrtiyai Inra puNNiyanE mukkaNNuDaiyA oru
  caraNam 2    malaiyai kArmukhamAkkiya vA oru malai mAdoru bhAgam maruva veLLi
 malai vAzh mAtE vA enadu mana malaiyai kaniya sheyumAorutiru
  caraNam 3    kAmadAsargatku ariyava enaduDal kAma nOikku iraiyAgiyadE
 rAmadASanukkiniyava amarA rAdhitanE vaidyanAthanE oru
